inrc knit with incrs for sleeve you make 2 inrcs for each sleeve on each side of sleeve symmetrical accordingly ❀ some clarity for sleeve increases you make one incr at the right and one at the left side of a sleeve total 4 incrs in the round the shoulder sts „grow back and front sts stay constant incr for a sleeve total 36 sts knit back sts until marker slm shoulder m1l knit shoulder sts until sleeve total 4 rnds total 24 sts then knit with incrs in every 2nd round 28 rnds/ 14 double incrs until you have on your needle 52 sleeve sts ❀ checking the numbers of sleeve stitches 16 + 8 + 28 = 52 sts knit 2 rnds more without incrs short row shaping ❀ the pullover is knitted with a short row without wrapped-turn as in the book knitting in the old way by priscilla a gibson / deborah robinson another method for example is german short row in the round use your preferred way ❀ „bring the short row into a smooth means pay attention to the first stitches at the turning points and incorporate
